Package com.group12.helper

Class MediaHelper

java.lang.Object
com.group12.helper.MediaHelper
@Component public class MediaHelper extends Object
The MediaHelper class is to manage and play media assets like background music and sound effects. It handles the initialization and control of media players.

  • Constructor Details

    • MediaHelper

      public MediaHelper() throws URISyntaxException
      Constructor of the global media player for the application. Plays the main background music in loop at the very first boot.
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - - throws an error when track does not exist in the provided location.

  • Method Details

    • switchBackgroundMusic

      public static void switchBackgroundMusic(Boolean isInGame)
      A method to switch background musics while going in and out game lobbies.
      Parameters:
      isInGame - - A boolean field to specify the background music.

    • playSoundEffect

      public static void playSoundEffect(String effect)
      A static helper method to play sound effects throughout the application.
      Parameters:
      effect - - effect name

    • initEffectPlayers

      public void initEffectPlayers()
      Method to initialize all sound effect players.
